banner.title: The first space-themed blockchain-powered mobile game
banner.mobile-subtitle: The first ever virtual universe based on blockchain
banner.text: For CG V 2.0.6 upgrade, the server will be shut down for 6~8 hours from 2:00 UTC. Please back up your keys.Thank you for your understanding.

about.title: What is CryptoGalaxy ?
about.des: The world's first virtual universe powered by blockchain, which runs on top of Zeepin Chain. It combines what a playable and profitable blockchain game has to fundamentally offer. Each planet is unique that you can give it a name and make transantions with other players. Find a planet, name it and trade it.
about.tips-before: CryptoGalaxy is coming up soon, but the first batch of planets available to users will be quite limited—only

cards.label: Explore planets
cards.value: You are now an explorer who can get started to find your own planet.

cards.label: GalaBots
cards.value: Minerals are varied with GalaBots.You can buy&sell your GalaBots through DEX.

cards.label: Rich in minerals
cards.value: Each planet is packed full of various minerals for you to explore！Not just being playable, it's profitable as well since all minerals can be converted into Gala and ZUSD on DEX.

cards.label: Elf system
cards.value: The universe is home to a tribe of elfs to amaze you with their magic power, but you have to be keen on training of them first!

sell.title: How can you get Gala?
sell.des: Gala has been developed to serve the whole Galaxy as a utility token that will set the price of any assets, tools available in the game. Good news is that you can get free Gala if you can accomplish certain tasks.

steps.label: STEP 02
steps.value: Hold ZPT token in your wallet

steps.label: STEP 03
steps.value: Get Gala for every ZPT you hold

steps.label: STEP 04
steps.value: Buy Planet and dig to earn more Gala

system.title: Country rankings
system.des: Each explorer represents his or her own country. The country owning the most planets will top others on the ranking list.

dashboard.title: Amusing incentive systems
dashboard.des: Multiple incentive systems enable CryptoGalaxy to be more than entertaining—players can make money as well.

feature.title: Diversified tasks
feature.des: There are plenty of diversified tasks designed for you to accomplish so that you can obtain Gala, upgrade your tools and get other valuable items at no cost.

marketPlace.text8: I have read and accepted the
marketPlace.text13: Explore the space filled with a range of assets, you can earn more by upgrade:
marketPlace.text16: All in-game assets can be traded here
marketPlace.text17: Players from all over the world are gathered here and ready to represent their country in a race for honor
marketPlace.text18: Small investment brings you steady growing return
marketPlace.text19: Safe trading system enables light-speed transations
marketPlace.text20: CryptoGalaxy is a virtual world powered by blockchain which mirrors the true meaning of blockchain game. It allows all data to run on top of a decentralized public chain catered to creative and entertainment industries-Zeepin Chain. All in-game assets including planets, GalaBots and cystals are made on-chain in a bid to create a world of democracy,fairness and transparency. As each asset has its own unique harsh code, you can check up your assets via {link}. Start your fun-filled journey to space exploration now！
marketPlace.text21: Unlike the vast majority of blockchain games which stay afloat by aggressive promotion and speculation, CryptoGalaxy focuses on how the underlying technology of blockchain can be maximally applied in games without any compromise in playability.
